name: DevDuality
description:
Artist and Programmer; Two sides of the same idiotic coin when it comes to creating video games. 

The world of the artist is pretty and wonderful, but looks without code won't get you far.... 

The world of the programmer may work as intended (occasionally), but sadly there is no visual asset to complete the scene...

 Play as Artist and Programmer to complete the puzzles in the level, while the audio guy gives his silent support through upbeat music and sounds directly sourced from the unsuspecting developers (we had no idea he was recording us)!

This game was made as a contribution to the GlobalGameJam 2022's theme DUALITY

Art

Annemarie Ollendorf

Lara Teegen

Anou Lange

Alina Rößner

Jan Keller

Programming

Kevin Holst

Konstantin Schubert

Audio & Sound
